Damage.Normal: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal {damage} {damageType} damage
Damage.Persistent: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal {damage} persistent {damageType} damage

Bane.Flat1: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal 1 damage of the weapon’s base damage type to creatures of type {creature}
Bane.D4: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal 1d4 damage of the weapon’s base damage type to creatures of type {creature}
Bane.D6: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal 1d6 damage of the weapon’s base damage type to creatures of type {creature}
Bane.D8: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal 1d8 damage of the weapon’s base damage type to creatures of type {creature}
Bane.D10: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal 1d10 damage of the weapon’s base damage type to creatures of type {creature}
Bane.Persistent1: Strikes with the weapon cause external or internal bleeding in creatures of type {creature}. Against such creatures, Strikes with the weapon deal 1 persistent bleed damage
Bane.PersistentD6: Strikes with the weapon cause external or internal bleeding in creatures of type {creature}. Against such creatures, Strikes with the weapon deal 1d6 persistent bleed damage
Bane.PersistentD8: Strikes with the weapon cause external or internal bleeding in creatures of type {creature}. Against such creatures, Strikes with the weapon deal 1d8 persistent bleed damage
Bane.PersistentD10: Strikes with the weapon cause external or internal bleeding in creatures of type {creature}. Against such creatures, Strikes with the weapon deal 1d10 persistent bleed damage

Imbues.AddCantrip: The weapon can cast {cantrip} as a cantrip, heightened to half the item’s level rounded up

Magic.Level4: The weapon can cast 1st rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rnNGALRtsjspFTws] once per day
Magic.Level6: The weapon can cast either 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0] or 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rnNGALRtsjspFTws] once per day, but not both
Magic.Level8: The weapon can cast 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0] and 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rnNGALRtsjspFTws] each once per day
Magic.Level12: The weapon can cast 4th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0], 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rnNGALRtsjspFTws], and 5th rank Acid Storm each once per day
Magic.Level16: The weapon can cast 6th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0], 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rnNGALRtsjspFTws], and 7th rank Acid Storm each once per day
Magic.Level20: The weapon can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r4HLQcYwB62bTayl] once per day but you can only choose the acid rain effect. You can choose the acid rain effect twice in a row

Might.Level8: On a critical hit, the target’s armor (if any) takes 3d6 acid damage (before applying Hardness); if the target has a shield raised, the shield takes this damage instead
Might.Level12: The acid damage dealt by Acid Imbue's Might Path ignores resistances
Might.Level14: On a critical hit, the target’s armor (if any) takes 6d6 acid damage (before applying Hardness); if the target has a shield raised, the shield takes this damage instead
Might.Level20: On a successful Strike with the weapon, before applying acid damage, the target gains weakness 1 to acid until the beginning of your next turn

Tech.Level8: On a critical hit, the target’s armor (if any) takes 3d6 acid damage (before applying Hardness); if the target has a shield raised, the shield takes this damage instead
Tech.Level12: The acid damage dealt by Acid Imbue's Technique Path (including the persistent acid damage) ignores resistances
Tech.Level14: The persistent acid damage from the imbued property eats away at a foe’s resistances. Every time a foe or the foe’s armor or shield takes damage from the persistent acid damage at the end of their turn, any resistances and Hardness decrease by 1 for 1 minute. This effect is cumulative
Tech.Level20: On a critical hit, acid eats away at the foe’s innards, and they are drained 1

Might.Level6: On a critical hit, you sap the strength of a creature of type {creature}, causing it to be enfeebled 1 until the end of your next turn
Might.Level10: Against a creature of type {creature}, the weapon’s base damage ignores the first 5 points of the target’s resistance
Might.Level14: The weapon can outright slay creatures of type {creature}. On a critical hit, a creature of of type {creature} must attempt a Fortitude save. On a critical success, it’s enfeebled 1 until the end of your next turn, on a success, it’s enfeebled 2 until the end of your next turn, on a failure, it’s enfeebled 3 until the end of your next turn, and on a critical failure, it’s destroyed. This effect has the incapacitation trait

Tech.Level6: On a critical hit, you sap the strength of a creature of the bane type, causing it to be enfeebled 1 until the end of your next turn
Tech.Level10: Against a creature of type {creature}, the weapon’s base damage ignores the first 5 points of the target’s resistance and the persistent bleed damage from Bane Imbue's Technique Path ignores the target’s resistance
Tech.Level14: The weapon can outright slay creatures of type {creature}. On a critical hit, a creature of of type {creature} is enfeebled 2 until the end of your next turn. It must also attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, it’s enfeebled 3 until the end of your next turn, and on a critical failure, it’s destroyed. This effect has the incapacitation trait
Tech.Level20: The weapon can outright slay creatures of type {creature}. On a critical hit, a creature of of type {creature} is enfeebled 2. It must also attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, it’s enfeebled 3, and on a critical failure, it’s destroyed. This effect has the incapacitation trait. The enfeebled condition from a critical hit lasts as long as the persistent bleed damage lasts, or until the end of your next turn, whichever is longer
